ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and make my task easy for me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and ease my task for me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And make my task easy for me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And ease my task for me;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And make my affair easy to me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and do Thou ease for me my task.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And ease my task for me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and make my task easy for me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And ease for me by affair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Make my task easy for me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And ease my task for me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and ease my task for me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And ease my task for me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And ease for me my task
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:26] And make easy, facilitate, for me my affair, that I may deliver it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And ease my task for me) make it easy for me to convey the message to Pharaoh;
